content: Pinned a minimal set of core scientific Python dependencies (NumPy/SciPy/SymPy/Pandas/Matplotlib) in `requirements.txt` to support deterministic numerical, symbolic, and plotting experiments.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('requirements.txt')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""# Minimal pinned dependencies for reproducible toy-model numerical/symbolic experiments
# (Keep this list lean; stdlib handles CLI/config/IO.)
numpy==2.1.3
scipy==1.14.1
sympy==1.13.3
pandas==2.2.3
matplotlib==3.9.2
"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:requirements.txt')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Pinned a minimal set of core scientific Python dependencies (NumPy/SciPy/SymPy/Pandas/Matplotlib) in `requirements.txt` to support deterministic numerical, symbolic, and plotting experiments.
